description: Base <hyperlink>Melee</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Physical Ranged</hyperlink> attacks deal 20% of their damage to up to 2 other enemy units within 2 hexes.

name: Avatar of Nature
Lord of Production
description:
The city of which this hero is governor gains 25 Production income.



Only one hero can be this Lord at any time.

name: Lord of Magic
description:
The city of which this hero is governor gains 15 Mana income.



Only one hero can be this Lord at any time.

name: Lord of Knowledge
description:
The city of which this hero is governor gains 15 Knowledge income.



Only one hero can be this Lord at any time.

name: Lord of Crops
description:
The city of which this hero is governor gains 25 Food income.



Only one hero can be this Lord at any time.

name: Supreme Magic
description: Causes a unit to explode when killed, dealing 20 <damageSpirit></damageSpirit> <hyperlink>Spirit Damage</hyperlink> to adjacent enemy units.

name: Mind Crush
description:
Base Magic attacks have a base 30% chance of inflicting Insanity.



Effects are increased for non-repeating attacks.

name: Blinding Magic
description:
Base Magic attacks have a base 60% chance of inflicting Blind.



Effects are increased for non-repeating attacks.

description: <hyperlink>Support</hyperlink> abilities grant 1 Bolstered Resistance to affected units.

description:
Makes base Melee and Physical Ranged attacks gain:Base 60% chance of inflicting Sundered Defense.Demolisher.

name: Withering Decay
description:
Base attacks gain a base 90% chance of inflicting Decaying.



Effects are increased for non-repeating attacks.

name: Mark of Misfortune
description:
Makes base attacks of enchanted units:Inflict Misfortune.

Effects are increased for non-repeating attacks.

name: Grim Executioner
description: When this unit kills another, it gains 3 Fortune.

description: The Tail Swing ability now:<bulletlist><bullet>Displaces units hit up to 2 hexes.</bullet><bullet>Has a base 60% of stunning units hit.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Quickened Breath
description: Cooldown of the breath attack is reduced by 1 <turn></turn>.

description: When Governor, grants the city:<bulletlist><bullet>+15 <knowledge></knowledge><hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink></bullet><bullet>+20 <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>City Stability</hyperlink></bullet><bullet>+20 <garrison></garrison><hyperlink>Fortification Health</hyperlink></bullet></bulletlist>

description: When Governor, grants the city:<bulletlist><bullet>+10 <knowledge></knowledge><hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink></bullet><bullet>+15 <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>City Stability</hyperlink></bullet><bullet>+15 <garrison></garrison><hyperlink>Fortification Health</hyperlink></bullet></bulletlist>

description: Makes <hyperlink>Critical Hits</hyperlink> with <hyperlink>Magic</hyperlink> attacks inflict Gilded for 1 <turn></turn> Turn.

description:
